Author: rinserepeatbehavior
Text: I think that’s a really good idea. I’ll just get focused on cleaner eating. Thanks for your support ♥️

Author: zerocaloriewater
Text: it’s from the anticipation. i’d say to try to eat as close to TDEE, but only homecooked healthier/wholesome dishes to hit all the nutrients ur body may need and be misguiding u twds junk food. just for a day if possible cuz this is what usually offset any future triggers for me. then u can go back to what u know u can comfortably manage.
